sentences.en: A branch must be registered with the local chamber of commerce and the municipality.
sentences.cn: 分支必须向地方商会和自治市登记.

sentences.en: After downsizing of Taiwan Province, the status of local municipality must have been greatly elevated.
sentences.cn: 在精省后, 地方自治团体的地位势必大幅提升.

sentences.en: Assessed value as compared to full market value for a particular property allset by the municipality.
sentences.cn: 是指一项资产的评估价值与市场公开价值之间的比值.

sentences.en: Chongqing municipality is home to about 30 million people.
sentences.cn: 其影响一直持续到现在.

sentences.en: Commercial trade council of municipality directly under central government.
sentences.cn: 二)直辖市商业同业公会.

sentences.en: Feed or dispel water for mill , municipality and mine as well.
sentences.cn: 也可供工矿企业和城市给排水.

sentences.en: Identifying such unused land within the urban area is therefore a priority task for the municipality.
sentences.cn: 确定这样未用过的土地就成为市政部门的首要工作.

sentences.en: In 1970 the Municipality of Shanghai had about 12 million people.
sentences.cn: 在1970上海的自治市有大约12百万人民.

sentences.en: On internet, Mitla is called either village or town or municipality.
sentences.cn: 在网上, 米特拉这个地方或者叫做村子,或者叫做镇甚至市.

sentences.en: Our municipality is divided into ten districts.
sentences.cn: 我们这个市,下面设10个区.

sentences.en: The Beijing municipality, for example, has stakes in about 16,000 local businesses.
sentences.cn: 例如, 北京市在大约1.6万家地方企业中拥有股份.

sentences.en: The counties of Ganyu, Donghai and Guanyun under the jurisdiction of the Municipality of Lianyungang.
sentences.cn: 连云港市所辖的赣榆 、 东海、灌云县.

sentences.en: The municipality has / have closed the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 市政当局已关闭了那个游泳池.

sentences.en: The municipality has closed the swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 市政当局已“关闭”了那个游泳池。

sentences.en: Valuation work divided into zones across the municipality.
sentences.cn: 评估工作分成市内若干个区.

words.tran_cn: 市政的，市的；地方自治的
市制上；市政上；依市的规定
市民；市政当局；自治市或区

trans.tran_en: a town, city, or other small area, which has its own government to make decisions about local affairs, or the officials in that government
